name: Unlucid
description:
You find out that all your life has been a lie. You wake up from the simulation in an unfamiliar location with a Mech Suit nearby. Is there even a point to this? Are you really awake now?

Dev's Note:

Thanks for checking out Unlucid! This is my first demo release for this game. I intend to continue developing it. Follow my progress on https://twitter.com/HarambertGames

Enjoy!
